rules_text:
Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Threshold[/i] – If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead search your library for any card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
[i]“The Abyss is no place for ordinary mortals.”
—Ingward, Guardian of the Seal[/i]
